name: 2025-12-aicloudforge
description:
Code is heavily obfuscated with PyArmor. While it may be used for some kind of intellectual property protection, packages  also have other risk marks:
- Obfuscation is done with the trial PyArmor version
- Although obfuscated, it's distributed under the MIT license
- There is identification of the author, all names are very generic
- all URLs are invalid (repository, homepage)
